#summary Flickr photos close to an entity

==entity types==
  * city
  * POI
  * neighborhood
  * business (1km radius)
  * intersection

==url==
{{{http://api.townme.com/v1/e/<guid>/view/flickr}}}


==format==
 Results are in the format of [http://www.flickr.com/services/api/flickr.photos.search.html Flickr's JSON Search API].

==Example==

*query*
{{{
http://api.geoapi.com:8080/e/ritual-coffee-roasters-san-francisco-ca-94110/view/flickr?apikey=demo&pretty=1
}}}
